author: jsdelfino
msg: Code cleanup, improved exception handling and error reporting, moved global functions to the tuscany::sca::ws namespace, adjusted the logic in initSCARuntime to stop caching state locally as the SCA runtime can be reset/switched by another binding co-existing in the server.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Minor changes to improve exception handling and error reporting

author: jsdelfino
msg: Fixed memory violations in Logging, use a bigger static buffer for log messages, and removed TuscanyRuntimeException::operator char which returned a pointer to data on the stack.

author: jsdelfino
msg: Use the correct StringLiteral type (instead of BytesLiteral) in DataObjectListImpl when adding a string to the list.

author: stefano
msg: adding a bunch of faqs and a home-made doap-izer (that generates a little better RDF)
